name: data-object-lineage
description: Interactive data lineage visualizer for Azure Synapse
author: Vibecoding

scripts.build:azure: npm run build && npm run deploy:prepare
scripts.deploy:prepare: cp deploy/web.config dist/ && echo 'Deployment package ready in dist/'
scripts.deploy:zip: npm run build:azure && cd dist && zip -r ../deploy.zip . && cd .. && echo 'Created deploy.zip'
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run preview
